§6§lCosmic Variance and Its Effect on the Luminosity Function Determination in Deep High z Surveys§r

§8§oM. Trenti
M. Stiavelli§r

§72020§r
Comments: \u00a77\u00a7oApJ, 676, 767; Public cosmic variance calculator relocated at https://www.ph.unimelb.edu.au/ mtrenti/cvc/CosmicVariance.html\u00a7r

§n§5astro-ph§r§r
§6§lReceiver control for the Submillimeter Array§r

§8§oT. R. Hunter
R. W. Wilson
R. Kimberk
P. S. Leiker§r

§72020§r

Comments: \u00a77\u00a7o13 pages, 4 figures, 19 references, from a talkpresented at the SPIE Conference on Advanced Telescope and Instrumentation Control Software II, 27-28 August 2002 in Waikoloa, HI. The text was revised on July 7, 2020 to
provide a more accurate description of the distributed software by using a non-racially-based terminology of leader/follower. A few new references were also added\u00a7r
